messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Dark side of homeschooling?/Michael Moore
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10-13-2003 8:19:48 AM Mountain Daylight Time, mom@bellsouth.net writes: Anyone see Michael Moore s Bowling for Columbine? ************** I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10-13-2003 8:19:48 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
mom@... writes:
Anyone see Michael Moore's Bowling for Columbine?
**************
I just finished his new book, "Dude, where's my country?" and he continues
his discussion of *fear in the media* ~ how different our world would be if a
different adjective was chosen (i.e. Millionaires attack WTC instead of
Terrorists). This family could have been described by several other ~ equally
terrifying~ adjectives. CBS merely decided to attack Homeschoolers with their story.


diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
"You can follow your book and your map of wars, but I'll go and follow my
kids." -- Woody Guthrie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
